Plot: In a city rife with injustice, ex-cop Billy Taggart seeks redemption and revenge after being double-crossed and then framed by its most powerful figure: Mayor Nicholas Hostetler.
Title: Broken City
Actors: Mark Wahlberg, Russell Crowe, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Jeffrey Wright
tomatoConsensus: Broken City's thinly sketched, formulaic script offers meager rewards for all but the least demanding noir aficionados.
